bibl.title: Pilgrimage, Place, and Meaning Making by Jews in Greco-Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: The Importance of Place. - Place Theory: Four Dimensions. - Pilgrimage as Emplacement. - Jerusalem as a Pilgrimage Site. - Jewish Pilgrimage in the Egyptian Context. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Wayne O. McCready, Pilgrimage, Place, and Meaning Making by Jews in Greco-Roman Egypt.
Philip A. Harland (ed.), Travel and Religion in Antiquity = Studies in Christianity and Judaism. 21 (Waterloo, ON, 2011) pp. 69-81.
The Importance of Place. - Place Theory: Four Dimensions. - Pilgrimage as Emplacement. - Jerusalem as a Pilgrimage Site. - Jewish Pilgrimage in the Egyptian Context. - Conclusion.
